data.message: Still Need A Thumb Down For Dislike...

replies.message: Hi John. People come to Facebook to share updates that are happy, sad, funny, painful, and thought-provoking, and we’ve heard feedback that people would like more ways to express how they feel. We created Reactions to provide a range of ways to express yourself. -Jordan
Facebook , I know all that but a "simple dislike button" would make a respectful negative response to a post without upsetting your delicate views.
I'd like a dislike button too.
Facebook we want a dislike button, no way around it

A dislike button would really turn me away from Facebook. I want FB to be enjoyable and positive!! I do not want to "dislike" any thing my friends post and in return I would not like to receive a "dislike" post.
Yes please a dislike is a reaction too. We all know Facebook is not utopia land as much as Facebook would like this to be, so a dislike would be great.
And what about he videos of people getting beat?? A dislike would be good for that.

Well, that's great that you don't want it, Jordan, but we've been asking for a "dislike" button for at LEAST 10 years now. It feels weird to "like" a sad post as a way of showing support for someone. Facebook isn't a utopia, as Taina stated. Trust me, once you have the option, you'll find something to use it on.
Jordan Kamalu so your family member dies and you post about it, you'd rather have a sad or angry button used? Having a crap day and wanting to vent, lets like it.
I am with you! Brig a dislike buttom
Mine don't work either. And I have updated, deleted and redownloaded the app.
Has to be paid for somehow and if a few clicks of like makes this free for us then why not 😬
Facebook needs a DISLIKE button! Just a small simple button....... let us make the choice.
Hope your day gets better. Lighten up!
